TopicTitle: Kerbals to get Medals, Experience points, and History of # of missions

Articles.Content:
Hi , Do not know if it was thought of , probably was

I would like to see Kerbals get Medals for missions accomplished , ie successful take off and land , Munar Landing and safe return and etc , Experience points so every mission they get better and better rating like bronze star , silver and Gold , and a History of # of missions the Kerbals

have partaken so You can see in the kerbal list Your #1 Kerbal

This game is amazing erm I mean Sim

Experience and even fame for Kerbal crews is a planned feature

(Thread locked).
